width.description:
width of the Slide widget. Can be either a number or a percentage.
Example: 15

height.description:
height of the Slide widget. Can be either a number or a percentage.
Example: "25%"

extra_trigger_size.description:
transparent extra trigger area, must > 0 or else the button will not be triggered.
Default 5

bg_color.description:
background color of the widget: pattern: `#rgb`/`#rrggbb`/`#rrrgggbbb`/`rgb(r, g, b)`/`rgba(r, g, b, a)`.
For additional notes, please refer to: https://gtk-rs.org/gtk4-rs/stable/latest/docs/src/gdk4/rgba.rs.html#205
Default `#808080`

fg_color.description:
foreground color of the widget: pattern: `#rgb`/`#rrggbb`/`#rrrgggbbb`/`rgb(r, g, b)`/`rgba(r, g, b, a)`.
For additional notes, please refer to: https://gtk-rs.org/gtk4-rs/stable/latest/docs/src/gdk4/rgba.rs.html#205
Default `#FFB847`

border_color.description:
border color of the widget: pattern: `#rgb`/`#rrggbb`/`#rrrgggbbb`/`rgb(r, g, b)`/`rgba(r, g, b, a)`.
For additional notes, please refer to: https://gtk-rs.org/gtk4-rs/stable/latest/docs/src/gdk4/rgba.rs.html#205
Default `#646464`

text_color.description:
text color of the widget: pattern: `#rgb`/`#rrggbb`/`#rrrgggbbb`/`rgb(r, g, b)`/`rgba(r, g, b, a)`.
For additional notes, please refer to: https://gtk-rs.org/gtk4-rs/stable/latest/docs/src/gdk4/rgba.rs.html#205
Default `#000000`

preview_size.description:
how much area should the widget reveal when hidden
Default 3

progress_direction.description:
progress bar left/down -> right/up : Forward/Backward
Default Forward

on_change.description: command to execute, replace '{progress}' with the progress from 0-1

is_text_position_start.description:
which side percentage info at, start or end
Default true

width.description:
width of the button. Can be either a number or a percentage.
Example: 15

height.description:
height of the button. Can be either a number or a percentage.
Example: "25%"

color.description:
main color of the button: pattern: `#rgb`/`#rrggbb`/`#rrrgggbbb`/`rgb(r, g, b)`/`rgba(r, g, b, a)`.
For additional notes, please refer to: https://gtk-rs.org/gtk4-rs/stable/latest/docs/src/gdk4/rgba.rs.html#205
Default `#7B98FF`

extra_trigger_size.description:
transparent extra trigger area, must > 0 or else the button will not be triggered.
Default 5

event_map.description:
array of tuples(int, string), int refers for the mouse button id.
 if you don't know what id your extra mouse button is, please run with `way-edges [group_name] --mouse-debug`: example [[1, "kitty #open up kitty console"],]
